CustomField.description: This URL data type field stores the location of the custom domain where the org has a custom domain defined (ex: https://domain.my.salesforce.com) using the My Domain Salesforce feature (https://help.salesforce.com/HTViewHelpDoc?id=domain_name_overview.htm). This is part of the SAML configuration.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If MyDomain is configured, what is the custom domain?
CustomField.label: Custom Domain
